snippet: Nick Watney said he was motivated by being paired with Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, who with Ryan Moore were a stroke behind the leader Vijay Singh at the BMW Championship.
abstract: Vijay Singh takes second-round lead at the BMW Championship golf tournament; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Nick Watney said he was motivated by being paired with Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, who with Ryan Moore were a stroke behind the leader Vijay Singh at the BMW Championship.

headline.seo: Watney Draws From Partners With Higher Profiles
headline.main: Big Names at Top Offer Inspiration
headline.print_headline: Big Names At Top Offer Inspiration
